data.lyric:
[ti:happier (Explicit)]
[ar:Olivia Rodrigo]
[al:SOUR (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]happier (Explicit) - Olivia Rodrigo
[00:01.58]Lyrics by：Olivia Rodrigo
[00:03.16]Composed by：Olivia Rodrigo
[00:04.74]We broke up a month ago
[00:08.47]Your friends are mine you know I know
[00:12.32]You've moved on found someone new
[00:15.46]
[00:16.23]One more girl who brings out the better in you
[00:20.79]
[00:21.31]And I thought my heart was detached
[00:24.99]
[00:25.58]From all the sunlight of our past
[00:29.76]But she's so sweet she's so pretty
[00:33.62]
[00:34.16]Does she mean you forgot about me
[00:37.82]Oh I hope you're happy
[00:42.29]But not like how you were with me
[00:46.46]I'm selfish I know I can't let you go
[00:50.88]So find someone great but don't find no one better
[00:54.80]
[00:55.44]I hope you're happy but don't be happier
[01:00.00]
[01:01.93]And do you tell her she's the most beautiful girl you've ever seen
[01:06.94]An eternal love bulls**t you know you'll never mean
[01:11.35]Remember when I believed
[01:13.52]You meant it when you said it first to me
[01:18.66]And now I'm pickin' her apart
[01:22.78]Like cuttin' her down will make you miss my wretched heart
[01:26.70]But she's beautiful she looks kind
[01:30.02]
[01:31.22]She probably gives you butterflies
[01:35.55]I hope you're happy
[01:39.72]But not like how you were with me
[01:43.93]I'm selfish I know I can't let you go
[01:48.32]So find someone great but don't find no one better
[01:52.57]I hope you're happy I wish you all the best really
[02:00.91]Say you love her baby
[02:03.13]Just not like you loved me
[02:05.37]And think of me fondly when your hands are on her
[02:09.80]I hope you're happy but don't be happier
[02:14.36]
[02:15.43]Ooh ooh
[02:21.75]
[02:22.58]Ooh ooh
[02:32.21]I hope you're happy
[02:36.10]Just not like how you were with me
[02:40.29]I'm selfish I know can't let you go
[02:44.78]So find someone great but don't find no one better
[02:49.09]I hope you're happy but don't be happier
data.trans:
[ti:happier (Explicit)]
[ar:Olivia Rodrigo]
[al:SOUR (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.58]//
[00:03.16]//
[00:04.74]一个月之前 我们分道扬镳
[00:08.47]我们拥有共同的朋友 你与我都心知肚明
[00:12.32]你已经释怀 另寻新欢
[00:15.46]
[00:16.23]又多了一位让你变得更好的女孩
[00:20.79]
[00:21.31]我以为我的心超然洒脱
[00:24.99]
[00:25.58]不再执着于我们美好的过去
[00:29.76]但是她是如此甜美 她是如此美丽
[00:33.62]
[00:34.16]她是否暗示你已经将我忘得一干二净
[00:37.82]我希望你过得快乐
[00:42.29]但是并不像你与我在一起时那般快乐
[00:46.46]我很自私 我知道 我无法放开你的手
[00:50.88]所以 找到无与伦比的对象 但是无法找到一位更好的恋人
[00:54.80]
[00:55.44]我希望你过得快乐 但是不要比以前更快乐
[01:00.00]
[01:01.93]你是否会告诉她 她是你见过的最漂亮的女孩
[01:06.94]一份矢志不渝的爱之类的鬼话 你知道你永远不会付出真心
[01:11.35]是否还记得你第一次对我深情告白时
[01:13.52]我竟然相信你是认真的
[01:18.66]现在我对她吹毛求疵
[01:22.78]好像我伤害她能够让你想念我难过的心
[01:26.70]但是她很漂亮 她看起来十分善良
[01:30.02]
[01:31.22]她可能会让你怦然心动
[01:35.55]我希望你过得快乐
[01:39.72]但是并不像你与我在一起时那般快乐
[01:43.93]我很自私 我知道 我无法放开你的手
[01:48.32]所以请你找一个很好的人 但是不要比我的更好
[01:52.57]我希望你过得快乐 我真心希望你一切顺遂
[02:00.91]你说你爱着她 宝贝
[02:03.13]只要不像你那般爱我
[02:05.37]当你的手放在她的身上时 请深情地想念我
[02:09.80]我希望你过得快乐 但是不要比以前更快乐
[02:14.36]
[02:15.43]//
[02:21.75]
[02:22.58]//
[02:32.21]我希望你过得快乐
[02:36.10]只要不像你与我在一起时那般快乐
[02:40.29]我很自私 我知道 无法放开你的手
[02:44.78]所以 找到无与伦比的对象 但是无法找到一位更好的恋人
[02:49.09]我希望你过得快乐 但是不要比以前更快乐
